Reviews.Title: Great system for cheap!!!
Reviews.Author: Sebastian Morris
Reviews.Content: This is a good system that is easy to install. I had quite a bit of trouble with the 1step remote viewing. The softwear would not load, I had to call tech support. Tech support was great, they logged into my desktop and set it up for me. The night vision of these cameras is excellent!  But the mounting backets only allow for a side mount. Also the narrow 60* view could use some work and the power supply should be changed to one plug and not 3. All in all this is a great system for the money!

ProductInfo.Features:
Versatile bullet & dome camera combination
Remote viewing on smartphone
500GB HDD for 2 years footage
Ultra hi-res video (600TVL)
24 IR LEDs for 65' night vision
ProductInfo.Name: Defender 21186 Surveillance Cameras (Black)
